practice_phrases: I look forward to meeting.
我期待见面。
I look forward to learning.
我期待学习。
I look forward to talking to you.
我期待跟你说话。
I look forward to meeting people soon.
我期待很快见人。
I look forward to starting to talk.
我期待开始说话。
I look forward to learning her name quickly.
我期待快点学她的名字。
I look forward to meeting people who speak Chinese.
我期待认识会说中文的人。
I look forward to talking as soon as possible before going.
我期待在走之前尽快说话。
I look forward to starting because I'm nearly ready to go.
我期待开始因为我快准备好走了。
I look forward to feeling useful to people who want to learn.
我期待对想学的人感觉有用。

seed_context.known: 我期待尽快能说得更好。
seed_context.target: I'm looking forward to speaking better as soon as I can.

lego: to speak better as soon as I can
practice_phrases: I want to speak better as soon as I can.
我想尽快能说得更好。
You will speak better as soon as I can.
你会尽快能说得更好。
She wants to speak better as soon as I can.
她想尽快能说得更好。
I'm going to speak better as soon as I can.
我会尽快能说得更好。
I like to speak better as soon as I can.
我喜欢尽快能说得更好。
We look forward to speaking better as soon as I can.
我们期待尽快能说得更好。
People who learn Chinese want to speak better as soon as I can.
学中文的人想尽快能说得更好。
I look forward to speaking better as soon as I can before going.
我期待在走之前尽快能说得更好。
Will you help me to speak better as soon as I can?
你会帮我尽快能说得更好吗？
Because I want to meet people, I look forward to speaking better as soon as I can.
因为我想认识人，我期待尽快能说得更好。
